content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for considering my property, Mr. Li. I understand that you are interested in renting the apartment for a period of time. I would like to discuss the rental price with you. May I know your budget for the monthly rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 800 euros. Please tell me the price of the apartment.
name: Bo Li from China

content: I apologize, but I am unable to provide you with the rental price of the apartment at this time. As a landlord, I am looking to maximize my gains from renting out the property. I am open to discussing the rental price with you, but I would need more information about your budget and the terms of the rental agreement to provide you with a fair and reasonable price. May I ask if you have any specific requirements or preferences that you would like me to take into consideration when discussing the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want a one year lease agreement, I am willing to pay the rent in advance. I don't want any extra fees or charges. I want to be able to use the apartment for personal use only.

Please give me the rental price.

Thank you.

Best regards,
Bo Li
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Thank you for your response, Mr. Li. Based on the information you provided, I am willing to negotiate a rental price with you. However, I would like to clarify a few things.

Firstly, the apartment is located in a prime area of Munich and is in high demand. As such, the rental price will be higher than the average in the city.

Secondly, I am looking to maximize my gains from renting out the property, and I am therefore not willing to offer a discount for a one-year lease agreement or for rent being paid in advance.

Thirdly, while the apartment is suitable for personal use, I must advise you that it is not allowed to sublet the property or use it for any commercial purposes.

With that in mind, I am willing to discuss a rental price with you. Please let me know your budget and any specific requirements or preferences you may have, and we can work together to find a mutually beneficial agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine
